text: @marklevinshow Why isn't the scarf wrapped around her head?  Why did Trump continue following these incompetent liars from the White House Coronavirus Task Force after they claimed that the "15 days to stop the spread" failed?  He should have said  "You're fired!" #WuhanCoronavirus #BirxScarfs
